name: Party Hats
description:
Since the festive ages of ancient times, the party hats - filled with proud and greed - fight each other for conquering the title of coolest party hat! In order to achieve that, they take control of characters and, with them, fight in arenas of diverse themes. Use your cellphone, your gamepad or your keyboard for enjoying this amazing party hats experience with your friends!

You can use our app as a control: https://play.google.com/store/...
